explains: n. 智力，才智；智能；情报，谍报；情报机构

sentences.en: Why was military intelligence so lacking?
sentences.cn: 为什么军事情报如此缺乏？

sentences.en: He deserted from army intelligence last month.
sentences.cn: 他上个月从军队情报部门开了小差。
